title: I Opened A Restaurant That Only Served Stolen Leftovers
description: In this video, Max Fosh opens a restaurant that only serves stolen leftovers.
summary: Max Fosh opens a restaurant that only serves stolen leftovers, showcasing the reactions of customers and the challenges he faces.
payoff: The humor comes from the absurdity of the concept and the reactions of customers as they realize they are eating stolen food. Max faces challenges in running the restaurant, adding to the comedic element.
